Name: My Coworker is an Idiot
About the game: You are a new employee at a glass company. Your task is to deliver glass to a construction site. It's a tough job, but luckily your coworker Steve is here to help. What could go wrong? This is a small hilarious game. There are 10 levels for you to play. Your goal is to deliver glass to a client. You can do it with an AI coworker. Or you can play with a friend.
